primarySourceText: This is too long. What I want you to do in the thoughts is summarize what the suitors have been doing at home.
specialInstructions: The suitors think you are daed but are willing to kill you if given the chance. Your wife loves you but believes you dead. Your son also loves you.
entranceDescription: A wonderous beauitful island, but most importantly...home

components.explorerDescription: You enter your house and see your son who is friendly to all and if you can convince him you're his father will fight with you.
components.fightingDetails: He's a fair fighter. If the main character is a level 10 fighter, he's a level 3. He wants to kill the suitors

food.how: You ask him for food as his guest

shipQuality.how: Your ship can be repaired but you can't sail on.

fame.how: Unknown how gain fame this way

gold.how: He will give you gives but they're all your own so you gain no gold.

components.explorerDescription: You enter your house and see the suitors who are hostile to you and will fight you.
components.fightingDetails: They can't fight well, but there's a lot of them.

food.how: They make you beg for food then humiliate you

fame.how: You gain fame by taking back your home

gold.how: They are not generous and will give you no gifts
